VoiceList.Entry: Barret “Damn! So this is the Temple of the Ancients!”
Barret “Oh man,you gotta be kiddin'. This is makin' me dizzy!”
Aeris “Words…feelings… So many of them here.”
Yuffie “Geeeez! We got our work cut out for us.”
“This is starting to get me really dizzy…”
Cid “@#$%! @#$%! @#$%! What the hell's with this place!”
Cait Sith “Wow,this place is huge! I'm starting to get bored.”
Vincent “No exits… We can't turn back.”
Red XIII “…sniff…sniff… This place smells good.”
“It smells the same as Cosmo Canyon.”
Tifa “What a strange place. Do you think we're welcome here?”
Aeris “…Cloud! I know it's going to be tough,but…”
“Don't give up! We can do it!”
Cloud “Sealed……? That sound brings back memories.”
